literature review

Gba Other

The following literatures discuss the miscellaneous of GBA, such as background, plan and cooperation

  1. (Hook & Neves, 2002)
  2. (Liu, 2019)
  3. (Kong et al., 2018)
  4. (Weng et al., 2020)
  5. (Yu et al., 2014)

References

  1. Hook, B., & Neves, M. S. (2002). The role of Hong Kong and Macau in China’s relations with Europe. The China Quarterly, 169, 108–135.
  2. Liu, K. (2019). China’s Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area: A Primer. The Copenhagen Journal of Asian Studies, 37(1), 36–56.
  3. Kong, D., Wang, Y., & Zhang, J. (2018). Efficiency Wages as Gift Exchange: Evidence from Corporate Innovation in China. Available at SSRN 3437225.
  4. Weng, H., Kou, J., & Shao, Q. (2020). Evaluation of urban comprehensive carrying capacity in the Guangdong–Hong Kong–Macao Greater Bay Area based on regional collaboration. Environmental Science and Pollution Research, 1–12.
  5. Yu, W., Hong, J., Zhu, Y., Marinova, D., & Guo, X. (2014). Creative industry clusters, regional innovation and economic growth in C hina. Regional Science Policy & Practice, 6(4), 329–347.
